article_title: 1863: A year of recovery for region's 150 residents
article_text:
Thank you for reading 5 free articles on our site. You can come back at the end of your 30-day period for another 5 free articles, or you can purchase a subscription at this time and continue to enjoy valuable local news and information. If you need help, please contact our office at 928-783-3333. You need an online service to view this article in its entirety.

og.description: Editor's Note: The Yuma Sun is running a series of stories spotlighting Yuma County's history as part of the county's 150th anniversary. The weeklong celebration includes the Great Yuma County Gold Hunt, and culminates in an event Nov. 7, celebrating our area's rich past and culture.
